title: Hero
description: Buttons can be ```buttons``` or ```p``` or ```div``` tags with the ```.adx-button``` class. To add colour, add the ```colour``` to the ```.adx-button``` class - e.g. ```adx-button-brand-red```.

variants.description: This hero is positioned right-top, accent colour overlay, h2 & left aligned
This hero is positioned left-bottom, brand-red colour overlay, h3 & right aligned
